mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_resume( resume_cd, login_id, resume_name, resume_regdate, resume_modidate )VALUES( #{resumeCd}, #{loginId}, #{resumeName}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO tb_resume_personal( resume_cd, personal_korname, personal_engname, personal_birthdate, personal_gender, personal_phone, personal_cellphone, personal_email, personal_sns, personal_addr, personal_regdate, personal_modidate ) VALUES ( #{resumeCd}, #{personalKorname}, #{personalEngname}, #{personalBirthdate}, #{personalGender}, #{personalPhone}, #{personalCellphone}, #{personalEmail}, #{personalSns}, #{personalAddr}, now(), now() )
